p: Participants were recruited through a Facebook advertisement from April 10 to 20, 2020. During the study period, the total number of confirmed cases contracting COVID-19 in Taiwan increased from 382 to 422 without no new deaths. Of the 40 newly confirmed cases, only 1 was domestic. It indicated that this study was conducted during the period of COVID-19 mitigation in Taiwan. However, a collective COVID-19 infection among the members of the Navy serving on a three-ship fleet broke out during the period. Meanwhile, the total number of infected cases all over the world massively increased to nearly 800,000. The domestic and foreign situations intensified worry about COVID-19 among people in Taiwan.
